# Replication

Cross-region cache synchronization and consistency

## Overview

The `replication` submodule provides cross-region cache synchronization and consistency.

## Installation

This submodule is part of the Codomyrmex platform and is installed with the main package.

```bash
pip install codomyrmex
```

## Quick Start

```python
from codomyrmex.cache.replication import *

# Example usage
# TODO: Add practical examples
```
